WorkItem.Description:
For my feral cat, the strength trinkets are ranked way too high. I think this is due to a faulty ICD/duration ratio in the code or whatever, because the tooltips look like they don't follow the duration x 5 = ICD - rule(for procc trinkets).
Â 
Reported this as bug for the in-game addon first, because I hadn't found this page, and the mod/creator pointed me here.

Comments.Message: As opposed to the non-feral cat?
Please read and follow the posting guidelines or we can't help you.
Sorry, first time I posted here, and forgot to read the guidelines. My bad

This is not a Cat bug, it's an ItemCache bug.

I don't see any info that we need that he didn't provide, Jothay.
Sorry, I read that as a cat thing. Rereading it I see what you mean. Ill fix it when I'm back on a real browser.

Well, I went through all of the trinkets, and I can vouch that almost every single trinket is correctly marked in terms of the 5 * duration for On Equip and 6 * duration for On Use.

There are a few that are not following these rules, most of whom are tanking trinkets. The only other that is not following this rule is Grace of the Herald. The Rogue Community on EJ found out that the ICD on this is 100 seconds instead of the expected 50 seconds.

http://elitistjerks.com/f78/t105429-cataclysm_mechanics_testing/

So unless you can provide your character name/realm or post your saved file, so that we can see what you are seeing, I don't know what else to tell you.

Tradu - EU-Vek'nilash (might be logged out in resto gear). http://eu.battle.net/wow/en/character/veknilash/tradu/simple

And to see the trinket rankings just go set the char to cat druid, and look at the trinket selection. Heart of Rage heroic is on top, and it says 20 sec duration / 45 sec ICD, and that looks very wrong. Heart of Solace heroic is the next other trinket, with the same duration/ICD ratio.

Those were fixed a few weeks ago (beginning of the month). You probably have old data and they need to be refreshed, I just uploaded last night some changes and I went through that file and the two trinkets (both normal and heroic versions) you mentioned are running 20 seconds 10% chance to proc with a 100 second ICD.
I use the web application on EJ, how do I get the new data? Because I've loaded it lots of times in the past few weeks, and it still says 20/45

Options -> Reset All Caches

Or if you want just right click the item in the Graph and say "Refresh Item from Wowhead"

Deleted and reloaded, and it worked.
I'm still kinda confused by the fact that the Heart of Rage(H) is rated 4th best, but that must be because the other raiding trinkets have bad proccs.
